tasks.title: Quick Workout
tasks.subtitle: 5 min · Fitness
instructions: Warm up with jumping jacks for 60 seconds.
Alternate squats and lunges for 3 minutes.
Finish with a 1-minute plank to lock in the burn.

tasks.title: Push-up Challenge
tasks.subtitle: 3 min · Strength
instructions: Perform slow push-ups with proper form.
Rest for 10 seconds between sets.
Focus on controlled breathing throughout.

tasks.title: Stretch & Reset
tasks.subtitle: 4 min · Relaxation
instructions: Roll shoulders back for 30 seconds.
Stretch neck side-to-side for 1 minute.
Hold a gentle forward fold for 2 minutes.

tasks.title: Cold Splash
tasks.subtitle: 2 min · Refresh
instructions: Splash your face with cold water for 30 seconds.
Switch to wrists and neck to awaken senses.
Finish with deep inhales and exhales.

tasks.title: Walk Break
tasks.subtitle: 10 min · Mindful movement
instructions: Step outside and set an easy walking pace.
Match steps with breathing—four counts in, four counts out.
End with a gratitude thought before returning.

tasks.title: Wall Sit
tasks.subtitle: 1–2 min · Discipline
instructions: Slide down a wall until knees form a 90° angle.
Engage your core and keep your back flat.
Hold steady for as long as possible without strain.

tasks.title: Guided Meditation
tasks.subtitle: 10 min · Calm
instructions: Find a quiet spot and sit comfortably.
Close your eyes and follow a guided meditation.
Notice thoughts drifting by without grabbing onto them.

tasks.title: Gratitude Reflection
tasks.subtitle: 5 min · Positive thinking
instructions: Write down three things you appreciate today.
Describe why each item matters to you.
Read the list aloud to reinforce positive emotion.

tasks.title: Journaling Prompt
tasks.subtitle: 8 min · Clarity
instructions: Set a timer and free-write without editing.
Answer: “What made you proud this week?”
Close with one actionable step for tomorrow.

tasks.title: Affirmations Session
tasks.subtitle: 3 min · Confidence
instructions: Stand tall and breathe deeply.
Repeat three personalized affirmations aloud.
Visualize moments where those affirmations are already true.

tasks.title: 2-Minute Calm Breathing
tasks.subtitle: Easy
instructions: Inhale for a count of four.
Hold gently for two counts.
Exhale slowly for six counts.

tasks.title: Box Breathing
tasks.subtitle: 4 min · Focus
instructions: Inhale for four counts.
Hold for four counts.
Exhale for four counts, then hold again.

tasks.title: Alternate Nostril Breath
tasks.subtitle: 5 min · Balance
instructions: Close your right nostril and inhale through the left.
Switch nostrils and exhale slowly.
Repeat, alternating sides with each breath.

tasks.title: Energy Reset Breath
tasks.subtitle: 3 min · Activation
instructions: Take quick inhales and powerful exhales.
Keep your spine tall to move energy upward.
Slowly return to normal breathing for the final 30 seconds.

tasks.title: Sleep Wind-Down
tasks.subtitle: 6 min · Relaxation
instructions: Lie down or recline somewhere comfortable.
Breath in for four counts, out for six counts.
Let your eyelids grow heavier with each cycle.
